opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Smook v. MINNEHAHA COUNTY, SOUTH DAKOTA

opinion:
127 S.Ct. 1885 (2007)

Jodie SMOOK, petitioner,
v.
MINNEHAHA COUNTY, SOUTH DAKOTA, et al.

No. 06-1034.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 26, 2007.

Motion of Juvenile Law Center for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
